3: Welcome back, Commandant. I, great Lucia, have been waiting for you for ages!
And I, Lee, have been doing the same.
Should I talk like that too? Okay, here goes. I, Ayl... No, I, Liv, have also been waiting for you.
Mm, that wraps up the Gray Raven intro.
We're the new Gray Raven.
We are an imitation of Gray Raven.
Aw shucks, ya blew it!
The truth is...
Because you've been away for too long, Commandant, the real Gray Raven was disbanded by HQ not long ago.
Nanami seems to be hiding something, but Ayla chimes in and reveals the surprising truth.
If Gray Raven was disbanded, then why is the office still here? Why are those three still standing there? Just as you are about to ask...
Stop messing around, you three. Come over and give me a hand.
The office door swings open with a familiar voice. You turn and see that familiar blue silhouette—Lee.

4: I thought Gray Raven was disbanded?

3: Why do you look so surprised...? You didn't really get fooled by those three, did you?
It's just a prank from Nanami and the others... Don't take it seriously, Commandant.
Indeed. That was another prank by Nanami and the others, though I am surprised at their level of commitment to the gag, volunteering for housesitting duty.
Bianca and Karenina follow. The two Purifying Force members and Lee seem to be carrying something.
Hmph, this here is a little something Bianca and I prepared. Telling you would ruin the surprise!
You're the star today, so you sit your Commandant butt down on the sofa... Don't pull another one of your disappearing acts on me again, okay?
Karenina is as thorny and biting as ever, yet you can hear telltale signs of joy mixed therein.
You're back. As expected, Commandant. May we come in?
Sure thing! Oh, and I'm sitting next to Commandant!
Kamui... looks like you've got to re-learn your manners.
After the Purifying Force came Strike Hawk. Unlike the charitable Chrome, Kamui just plonks himself next to you and fishes a small terminal from his pocket.
Since Watanabe couldn't make it, he asked me to pass along this message...
Commandant of Gray Raven, it's been a while since we parted ways. I wonder how you're doing... No, this is not meant as a greeting.
Anyway, I look forward to our next meeting, 【kuroname】.
Watanabe prepared a long speech, but it was reduced to these two sentences by the time I received it. I guess the deleted part is saved for when you two meet.
Ah, Liv and Lucia are back.
Commandant, oh... it's really you. I thought...
Liv, we agreed there would be no tears today.
Yeah... I know.
Anyway, welcome back... Commandant.

4: Are you guys preparing for something?

3: I gathered everyone here to welcome you back to Babylonia. I know you like a good party.
A welcome back party for you... Actually, I've never done this before. Good thing is everyone's enthusiastic about pitching in.
Commandant, I don't know if there will be more missions that require you to be away for such a long time, but at least you'll be staying for the near future, right?
So, once again, Commandant, let me be your blade and your strength!
Now, now, Lucia, you can't keep Commandant all to yourself today.
I don't think we're on the same page...
Well, now that everyone's here, and Commandant's back, let's say that thing together!
Welcome home, Commandant!
